import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import { PhotoIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/solid"; import * as Yup from "yup"; import axios from "axios"; import { Formik } from "formik"; import { AuthContext } from "../services/account.service"; const Blog = () => { const { getUserInfo } = useContext(AuthContext); const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const fetchUserInfo = async () => { const data = await getUserInfo(); setUserInfo(data); }; fetchUserInfo(); }, [getUserInfo]); //user Information const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [lastname, setLastname] = useState(""); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [imgUrl, setImgUrl] = useState(""); const [profile, setProfile] = useState(""); const handleFileChange = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0]; const url = URL.createObjectURL(file); setImgUrl(file); setProfile(url); }; // updateUser const updateUser = () => { const data = { name: userInfo.name, lastname: userInfo.lastname, username: userInfo.username, email: userInfo.email, password: userInfo.password, imgUrl: userInfo.imgUrl, }; if (name) data.name = name; if (lastname) data.lastname = lastname; if (username) data.username = username; if (email) data.email = email; if (password) data.password = password; if (imgUrl) data.imgUrl = imgUrl; axios .put(`http://localhost:4000/order/${userInfo._id}`, data) .then((res) => console.log(res)) .catch((error) => console.log(error)); }; return ( {({ erros, touched, handleChange, handleBlur, isSubmitting }) => (
